REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0260 reute b f BC-OKB-ISSUES-100-MLN-CA 03-13 0079

TEXT.TITLE: OKB ISSUES 100 MLN CANADIAN DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: Oesterreichishce Kontrollbank AG is issuing a 100 mln Canadian dlr eurobond due March 20, 1997 at nine pct and priced at 101-7/8 pct, Morgan Guaranty Ltd said as joint book-runner with LTCB International. The bond is available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 dlrs and will be listed in Luxembourg. Fees comprised 1-1/4 pct selling concession with 3/4 pct for management and underwriting combined. REUTER
